name: Hentai: Exposed
description:
Hentai: Exposed is a 2D platformer, each level you complete will be a great accomplishment.
Including 25 agonising levels to test your endurance, 1 world, 1 boss and 1 amazing waifu.Features
  • Allot of action.
  • 22 collectibles.
  • Timer for the speedrunners.
  • Hours of gameplay (If you suck).
  • A terrifying tentacle boss.
  • The best meme Achievements.
  • Steam Trading Cards.
